trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Boone
There were no other sightings in Boone on or around September 21st 2012
divs: sighting detailsoutside having a cigarette, noticed a *star* way brighter than the ones surrounding. went inside, had another person come out for a cigarette and noticed in the distance at least 6 *things* hovering, disappearing off in the distance, we were staring down the super bright light and it went completely black, anf in approximately 6 seconds it came back on. it hovered and would dart to thew left , right, up and down until sunrise at which time it the light shut off and came on....when using phone to take pictures, i could only capture the big light, the others did not come into the focus\photo.....cannot explain, cannot get anmyone to listen,,,,,every night since, in the same direction , there is nothing, until approximately 11:30pm or later a bright *star* appears.......called the sd and 2 deputies came out, one said he noticed movement and they were gonna cover some of the area but never got back to me
